sentence.Network_en: Recent studies suggested that erythromycin may be effective in prophylaxis against pertussis in exposed, susceptible persons.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近的研究提示,红霉素对暴露于百日咳的易感者,在预防上有效.

sentence.Network_en: GVHD prophylaxis regimen consisted of cyclosporine ( CsA ) and mycophenolate mofetil ( MMF ).
sentence.Network_cn: 移植物抗宿主病(GVHD) 的预防采用环孢菌素A ( csa ) +霉酚酸酯 ( MMF ) 方案.

sentence.Network_en: Fluconazole was the most commonly used agent for universal and targeted prophylaxis.
sentence.Network_cn: 氟康唑是最普遍的对所有患者和高危患者的预防性用药.
